articles.title: Hall of Fame QB Len Dawson, who led Kansas City Chiefs to Super Bowl IV win, dies at age 87
articles.description: Len Dawson, a Pro Football Hall of Famer as both a quarterback and a broadcaster, has died at the age of 87, according to his family.

articles.title: San Diego Padres' Fernando Tatis Jr. apologizes for 80-game suspension, will have shoulder surgery
articles.description: San Diego's Fernando Tatis Jr. said of his 80-game suspension that "there is no one else to blame but myself." The star shortstop, who will have surgery on his left shoulder during his time away, said he was "truly sorry" after testing positive.

articles.description: Dodgers right-hander Walker Buehler will miss the remainder of this season and likely 2023 as well after undergoing full reconstruction of his ulnar collateral ligament on Tuesday.
